Key Match Events: Dalton Knecht scored 35 points, including a stretch where he scored 20 in a row late in the fourth quarter and into overtime.
Dalton Knecht dominated the final minutes of the Lakers’ overtime win against the Suns.
Post-Match Reflections: Dalton Knecht expressed pride in his performance, comparing it to a memorable college game.
Kevin Durant encouraged Knecht to take over the game during overtime.
Lakers coach JJ Redick praised Knecht's mentality and shooting ability.
Austin Reaves highlighted Knecht's coachability and desire for improvement.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Dalton Knecht was drafted at No. 17 due to concerns about his age and defensive limitations.
Knecht is leading the Lakers in minutes and averaging 10 three-point attempts per game.
